tool_description: Free, powerful language detection JSON REST API for 173 world languages, dialects and accents. Compatible with any application.
title: languagelayer

api_list.name: /batch
api_list.description: API endpoint used to perform batch language detection

optional_parameters.name: query[]
optional_parameters.description: Append multiple "query[]" parameters containing query texts

optional_parameters.name: show_query
optional_parameters.description: Set to "1" if you want the API's JSON result set to return your query text.
